Question
========

Jody is taking two courses: English and History. Assume the probability that she will will get an 8 at the end of the semester for:_____. \ P(grade 8 on the English exam) = 0.70. P(grade 8 for the History exam) = 0.60. P(grade 8 for both English and History exams) = 0.50 \ Then what is the probability that Jody will get an 8 in at least one subject?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,30
* 0,42
* 0,50
* 0,80

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.30: Incorrect
* 0.42: Incorrect
* 0.50: Incorrect
* 0.80: Correct
